page.title: 05Religious Attitudes.
page.content: {Saint Peter's Day Service. } The theme of this service was "Why should I be a Christian?",and the young people planned it. Christians gather in Christ's house to worship His name.Being a good Christian is a difficult thing. Following the ways of Jesus and repenting of your sins shows that you are a Christian. The Apostle's Creed tells us about Jesus and how He was crucified for His people.God sent His Son to save us and show us how to lead our lives. Being a good Christian is not just going to church on Sunday, it is always trying to be unselfish and putting other people before ourselves.
